g.title: Flaw1
g.text: (Ignores varying AI usage pattern throught the day)

g.title: Flaw2
g.text: . (Every task assumed to have same computation intensity-power consumed ratio) .

g.title: Canonical
g.text: . baseline + 3 Gaussian peaks; enforce 24h periodicity; normalize → r(t) .

g.text: . Stage 1: Dynamic Batching and User Latency allowded .

g.text: GPU Cluster/Pods Power demand based on hardware utilization

g.title: GlobalAgg
g.text: Final Tunable Global AI Demand Curve .
Provides Routed inference load to AI data center vs time

g.title: Stage0
g.text: . Stage 0: FLOPs ( Computation Intensity) per Request F_k .

g.text: . (GPU harmonics → proper filter and mitigation design) .

g.text: Predictive, time-resolved AI data center Power Modeling
